ygData.subject: 3rd Rank spells ?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have attained the 4th rank of spells and would like some advice on which spells to get next. I buy new spells as a get the money ( My Runed Totem staff
ygData.messageBody:
I have attained the 4th rank of spells and would like some advice on
which spells to get next. I buy new spells as a get the money ( My
Runed Totem staff cleaned me out) Now I have Shock of lightning, Bind
Affinity, and just purchased spiral of frost. I am intrigued by halo
of light and resistant skin. Any advice one the order of spells I
should purchase and reasoning why would be appreciated.

TIA
Larimus La'Shain
